      • taskClash

        public TaskUIFormat taskClash(Task newTask)
        Returns true if task clashes if existing tasks in storage Floating Tasks always returns false. Dateline Tasks returns true when it clashes with other dateline tasks or timed tasks.
        Parameters:
        newTask -
        Returns:
        boolean value
